text: Evar tam iraivanin kattalaikalai erruk kolkirarkalo, avarkalukku (atu) alakiya nanmaiyakum; innum evar avanatu kattalaikalai erruk kolla villaiyo, avarkalukku pumiyilulla porulkal yavum contamaka iruntu, attutan ataipponra (innoru) pakavum iruntu (marumaiyin vetanaiyiliruntu tappittukkolla) avarraiyellam mittup porulakak kotuttuvitave virumpuvarkal; (anal itu palanai alikkatu) avarkalukkuk kelvi kanakku mikavum katinamaka irukkum; avarkal tankum itam narakameyakum; atu mikavum ketta pukalita(mum aku)m
